A song for a great person!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: A song for a great person!
By Dragon's soul on Thursday, March 10, 2005 - 10:01 am:

I thought I'd devise this song for Lisa as a thankyou for her hard work. It is based on the song by Lolly (and relates to her website designing skills; which are fantastic by the way!)

Oh, Lisa you're so fine!
Your so fine you blow my mind!
Hey Lisa! He, he hey Lisa!
(Repeat)

Lisa, your websiting skills are fine,
So fine they blow my mind.
I just want to be on it time by time
and read it all line by line!
(Chorus)

Lisa, your so great,
I don't have to hesitate,
to praise you to all my friends.
Gosh, I hope this website never ends!
(Chorus and trumpets play)

Ohhh Lisa, your the bessssst, way better than all the ressssst!

We love you Lisa!


I hope you like it. I was only joking about her being better than the rest. All you guys are great, and in my opinion, this website would not have succeeded without y'all! (I'm not American, but I just wanted to use that word!)
